body:
Hi my name is Matthew Boyce and i was wondering how people get map dev. Irl i have a friend who is map dev (Zedther). I am currently making 5 maps all gradually and will release them all at once. Thanks for advice!
Thanks, Matt.
body_tagged:

title: Map Dev?

replies.body:
Just constantly upload high-quality maps to the forums for others to see! :D In time, the map devs will recognize you, and you might have a chance at being a dev. 

Good luck!
replies.body_tagged:
Just constantly upload high-quality maps to the forums for others to see! :D In time, the map devs will recognize you, and you might have a chance at being a dev. 

Good luck!

replies.body: Cool ill try my best :). I have made many maps but deleted them because they were not quality. Should I make nexus or nebula maps?
replies.body_tagged: Cool ill try my best :). I have made many maps but deleted them because they were not quality. Should I make nexus or nebula maps?

replies.body: It doesn't matter. You can make maps for any game mode. :P
replies.body_tagged: It doesn't matter. You can make maps for any game mode. :P
